attributes.action: Enable police officers to conduct a stop search  on knife crime
attributes.additional_details: Knife crime is growing rapidly and unfortunatly children and young people are massively at risk. The police do not have enough support to put measures in place.
attributes.background: Enable officers to conduct a stop search on individuals who are potentially carrying a knife and induce a 5 year sentence.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

Police officers already have the power to stop and search, you can find more information here: https://www.gov.uk/police-powers-to-stop-and-search-your-rights

You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Enact measures to combat knife crime
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702424
